meanings.definition: A small, raised red spot on the skin, typically caused by a blocked pore.
meanings.sent1: She had a few pimples on her face.
meanings.sent2: The teenager was self-conscious about her pimples.
meanings.sent3: The mirror revealed a surprise party of pimples on her nose.
meanings.sent4: Her face looked like a constellation of pimples under the bright lights.
meanings.sent5: The pimples on his forehead glowed like tiny red beacons.

meanings.definition: To have or be covered with pimples.
meanings.sent1: His skin pimples after eating too much chocolate.
meanings.sent2: The stress from exams caused her skin to pimple.
meanings.sent3: The thought of the upcoming presentation made his skin want to pimple.
meanings.sent4: Her face seemed to pimple overnight with worry.
meanings.sent5: The excitement made her skin pimple with anticipation.
